test-case.name: id-other-expr-001
test-case.description: Evaluates usage of an updating expression (delete) in initializing expression for variable declaration.

modified.change: converted from original XQUTS test id-other-expr-01

test-case.test: declare variable $input-context external; declare variable $x as xs:integer? := delete node $input-context/employees[1]/employee[1]; let $newVar := $x return $newVar

test-case.name: id-other-expr-002
test-case.description: Evaluates usage of an updating expression (insert) in initializing expression for variable declaration.

modified.change: converted from original XQUTS test id-other-expr-02

test-case.test: declare variable $input-context external; declare variable $x as xs:integer? := insert node <salary>25600</salary> after $input-context/employees[1]/employee[1]/salary[1]; let $newVar := $x return $newVar

test-case.name: id-other-expr-003
test-case.description: Evaluates usage of an updating expression (rename) in initializing expression for variable declaration.

modified.change: converted from original XQUTS test id-other-expr-03

test-case.test: declare variable $input-context external; declare variable $x as xs:integer? := rename node $input-context/employees[1]/employee[1]/salary[1] as "salary"; let $newVar := $x return $newVar

test-case.name: id-other-expr-004
test-case.description: Evaluates usage of an updating expression (replace) in initializing expression for variable declaration.

modified.change: converted from original XQUTS test id-other-expr-04

test-case.test: declare variable $input-context external; declare variable $x as xs:integer := replace node $input-context/employees[1]/employee[1]/salary[1] with <salary>34600</salary>; let $newVar := $x return $newVar

test-case.name: id-other-expr-005
test-case.description: Evaluates usage of an non-updating expression (transform) in initializing expression for variable declaration.

modified.change: converted from original XQUTS test id-other-expr-05

test-case.test: declare variable $input-context external; declare variable $x := $input-context/works[1]/employee[1]; declare variable $y as element() := copy $newVar := $x modify delete node $newVar/hours[1] return $newVar; $y

test-case.name: id-other-expr-006
test-case.description: Evaluates usage of an updating expression (delete) as part of a logical (and) expression and usage of fn:true() function.

modified.change: converted from original XQUTS test id-other-expr-06

test-case.test: declare variable $input-context external; fn:true() and (delete node $input-context/employees[1]/employee[1]/salary[1])

test-case.name: id-other-expr-007
test-case.description: Evaluates usage of an updating expression (delete) as part of a logical (or) expression and usage of fn:true() function.

modified.change: converted from original XQUTS test id-other-expr-07

test-case.test: declare variable $input-context external; fn:true() or (delete node $input-context/employees[1]/employee[1]/salary[1])

test-case.description: Evaluates usage of an updating expression (delete) as part of a logical (and) expression and usage of fn:false() function.

modified.change: converted from original XQUTS test id-other-expr-08

test-case.test: declare variable $input-context external; fn:false() and (delete node $input-context/employees[1]/employee[1]/salary[1])

test-case.description: Evaluates usage of an updating expression (delete) as part of a logical (or) expression and usage of fn:false() function.

modified.change: converted from original XQUTS test id-other-expr-09

test-case.test: declare variable $input-context external; fn:false() or (delete node $input-context/employees[1]/employee[1]/salary[1])

test-case.name: id-other-expr-010
test-case.description: Evaluates usage of an updating expression (rename) as part of a logical (and) expression and usage of fn:true() function.

modified.change: converted from original XQUTS test id-other-expr-010

test-case.test: declare variable $input-context external; fn:true() and (rename node $input-context/employees[1]/employee[1]/salary[1] as "salary1")

test-case.name: id-other-expr-011
test-case.description: Evaluates usage of an updating expression (replace) as part of a logical (and) expression and usage of fn:true() function.

modified.change: converted from original XQUTS test id-other-expr-011

test-case.test: declare variable $input-context external; fn:true() and (replace node $input-context/employees[1]/employee[1]/salary[1] with <salary1>120000</salary1>)

test-case.name: id-other-expr-012
test-case.description: Evaluates usage of an updating expression (insert) as part of a logical (and) expression and usage of fn:true() function.

modified.change: converted from original XQUTS test id-other-expr-012

test-case.test: declare variable $input-context external; fn:true() and (insert node <salary1>120000</salary1> into $input-context/employees[1]/employee[1])

test-case.name: id-other-expr-013
test-case.description: Evaluates usage of an non updating expression (transform) as part of a logical (and) expression and usage of fn:true() function.

modified.change: converted from original XQUTS test id-other-expr-013

test-case.test: declare variable $input-context external; let $var := $input-context/works[1]/employee[1] return fn:true() and (copy $newVar := $var modify delete node $newVar/hours[1] return $newVar)

test-case.name: id-other-expr-014
test-case.description: Evaluates usage of an updating expression (rename) as part of a Node Comparison (is) expression.

modified.change: converted from original XQUTS test id-other-expr-014

test-case.test: declare variable $input-context external; ($input-context/employees[1]/employee[1]/salary[1]) is (rename node $input-context/employees[1]/employee[1]/salary[1] as "salary1")

test-case.name: id-other-expr-015
test-case.description: Evaluates usage of an updating expression (delete) as part of a Node Comparison (is) expression.

modified.change: converted from original XQUTS test id-other-expr-015

test-case.test: declare variable $input-context external; ($input-context/employees[1]/employee[1]/salary[1]) is (delete node $input-context/employees[1]/employee[1]/salary[1])

test-case.name: id-other-expr-016
test-case.description: Evaluates usage of an updating expression (replace) as part of a Node Comparison (is) expression.

modified.change: converted from original XQUTS test id-other-expr-016

test-case.test: declare variable $input-context external; ($input-context/employees[1]/employee[1]/salary[1]) is (replace node $input-context/employees[1]/employee[1]/salary[1] with <salary1>120000</salary1>)

test-case.name: id-other-expr-017
test-case.description: Evaluates usage of an non updating expression (transform) as part of a node comparison (is) expression.

modified.change: converted from original XQUTS test id-other-expr-017

test-case.test: declare variable $input-context external; let $var := $input-context/works[1]/employee[1] return ($var) is (copy $newVar := $var modify delete node $newVar/hours[1] return $newVar)

test-case.name: id-other-expr-018
test-case.description: Evaluates usage of an non updating expression (transform) as part of a node comparison (is) expression (both operands are transform expressions).

modified.change: converted from original XQUTS test id-other-expr-018

test-case.test: declare variable $input-context external; let $var := $input-context/works[1]/employee[1] return (copy $newVar := $var modify delete node $newVar/hours[1] return $newVar) is (copy $newVar := $var modify delete node $newVar/hours[1] return $newVar)

modified.change: converted from original XQUTS test id-other-expr-019

test-case.test: declare variable $input-context external; ($input-context/employees[1]/employee[1]/salary[1]) is (insert node <salary1>107900</salary1> into $input-context/employees[1]/employee[1])

test-case.name: id-other-expr-026
test-case.description: Evaluates usage of an updating expression (delete) as part of a sequence expression (union operator).

modified.change: converted from original XQUTS test id-other-expr-26

test-case.test: declare variable $input-context external; ($input-context/employees[1]/employee[1]) union (delete node $input-context/employees[1]/employee[2])

test-case.description: Evaluates usage of an updating expression (delete) as part of a sequence expression (intersect operator).

modified.change: converted from original XQUTS test id-other-expr-027

test-case.test: declare variable $input-context external; ($input-context/employees[1]/employee[1]) intersect (delete node $input-context/employees[1]/employee[2])

test-case.name: id-other-expr-028
test-case.description: Evaluates usage of an updating expression (delete) as part of a sequence expression (except operator).

modified.change: converted from original XQUTS test id-other-expr-028

test-case.test: declare variable $input-context external; ($input-context/employees[1]/employee[1]) except (delete node $input-context/employees[1]/employee[2])

test-case.name: id-other-expr-029
test-case.description: Evaluates usage of a non updating expression (transform) as part of a sequence expression (union operator).

modified.change: converted from original XQUTS test id-other-expr-029

test-case.test: declare variable $input-context external; let $var1 := $input-context/works[1]/employee[1] let $var2 := $input-context/works[1]/employee[2] return (copy $newVar := $var1 modify delete node $newVar/hours[1] return $newVar) union (copy $newVar := $var2 modify delete node $newVar/hours[1] return $newVar)

any-of.assert-xml:
<employee name="Jane Doe 1" gender="female"> <empnum>E1</empnum> <pnum>P1</pnum>
</employee><employee name = "John Doe 2" gender="male"> <empnum>E1</empnum> <pnum>P2</pnum>
<hours>20</hours>Text data from Employee[2] </employee>

<employee name = "John Doe 2" gender="male"> <empnum>E1</empnum> <pnum>P2</pnum>
<hours>20</hours>Text data from Employee[2] </employee><employee name="Jane Doe 1" gender="female"> <empnum>E1</empnum> <pnum>P1</pnum>
</employee>

test-case.name: id-other-expr-030
test-case.description: Evaluates usage of a non updating expression (transform) as part of a sequence expression (intersect operator).

modified.change: converted from original XQUTS test id-other-expr-030

test-case.test: declare variable $input-context external; let $var1 := $input-context/works[1]/employee[1] return fn:count((copy $newVar := $var1 modify delete node $newVar/hours[1] return $newVar) intersect (copy $newVar := $var1 modify delete node $newVar/hours[1] return $newVar))

modified.change: converted from original XQUTS test id-other-expr-031

test-case.test: declare variable $input-context external; let $var1 := $input-context/works[1]/employee[1] let $var2 := $input-context/works[1]/employee[2] return (copy $newVar := $var1 modify delete node $newVar/hours[1] return $newVar) except (copy $newVar := $var2 modify delete node $newVar/hours[1] return $newVar)

test-case.name: id-other-expr-032
test-case.description: Evaluates usage of an updating expression (delete) as part of a range expression.

modified.change: converted from original XQUTS test id-other-expr-032

test-case.test: declare variable $input-context external; ($input-context/employees[1]/employee[1]) to (delete node $input-context/employees[1]/employee[2])
